remarks: Addition of a vector with its negative.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvnegid.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvnegid.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodvnegid.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lmodvnegid.n $e |- N = ( invg ` W ) $.
lmodvnegid $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .+ ( N ` X ) ) = .0. ) $.
